Name: conname
column6: constraint name (not necessarily unique!)

Name: connamespace
column6: the oid of the namespace that contains this constraint

Name: contype
column6: c = check constraint, f = foreign key constraint, p = primary key constraint, u = unique constraint

Name: condeferrable
column6: is the constraint deferrable?

Name: condeferred
column6: is the constraint deferred by default?

Name: conrelid
column6: the table this constraint is on; 0 if not a table constraint

Name: contypid
column6: the domain this constraint is on; 0 if not a domain constraint

Name: confrelid
column6: if a foreign key, the referenced table; else 0

Name: confupdtype
column6: foreign key update action code: a = no action, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confdeltype
column6: foreign key deletion action code: a = no action, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confmatchtype
column6: foreign key match type: f = full, p = partial, u = simple (unspecified)

Name: conislocal
column6: this constraint is defined locally in the relation. note that a constraint can be locally defined and inherited simultaneously

Name: coninhcount
column6: the number of direct ancestors this constraint has. a constraint with a nonzero number of ancestors cannot be dropped nor renamed

Name: conkey
column6: if a table constraint (including a foreign key), list of the constrained columns

Name: confkey
column6: if a foreign key, list of the referenced columns

Name: conpfeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = fk comparisons

Name: conppeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = pk comparisons

Name: conffeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for fk = fk comparisons

Name: conbin
column6: if a check constraint, an internal representation of the expression

Name: consrc
column6: if a check constraint, a human-readable representation of the expression
